patthana15.14:1.1: Hetuṃ hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.14:2.1: Nahetuṃ majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.14:3.1: Hetuṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
